edu2crebo.Name: Follow-up study programme: national education register code CREBO

edu2croho.Name: Follow-up study programme: national educatio register code CROHO

edu2fiel1.Name: Follow-up study programme: broad field of education and training EUROSTAT

edu2fiel2.Name: Follow-up study programme: narrow field of education and training EUROSTAT

edu2fiel3.Name: Follow-up study programme: detailed field of education and training EUROSTAT

Values.140: Teacher training and education science (broad programmes)
Values.144: training for teachers at basic levels
Values.145: training for teachers with subject specialisation
Values.146: training for teachers of vocational subjects

edu2ilt.Name: Follow-up study programme: national education register code ILT

Values.2: A Lower secondary education: leading to access ISCED 3A and 3B
B Lower secondary education: leading to access ISCED 3C
C Lower secondary education: primarily focused on access to labour market
Values.3: A (Upper) Secondary education: leading to access ISCED 5A
B (Upper) Secondary education: leading to access ISCED 5B     3 C (Upper) Secondary education: primarily focused on access to labour market and access to ISCED 3 and 4
Values.4: A Post-secondary non tertiary education: leading to access ISCED 5A
B Post-secondary non tertiary education: leading to access ISCED 5B
C Post-secondary non tertiary education: primarily focused on access to labour market
Values.5: A First stage of tertiary education: largely theoratically based
B First stage of tertiary education: practical orientated

edu2lev1.Name: Follow-up study programme: main level
edu2lev1.Remark: Variable is based on ROA education classification

Values.10: Senior general secondary and pre-university education
Values.90: Secondary vocational education apprenticeship system levels 1/2
Values.100: Secondary vocational education apprenticeship system levels 3/4

edu2lev2.Name: Follow-up study programme: main level and broad field
edu2lev2.Remark: Variable is based on ROA education classification

Values.45: Preparatory sec. voc. education (health and welfare)
Values.64: Sec. voc. education levels 1/2 (health and welfare)
Values.65: Sec. voc. education levels 1/2 (humanities/arts/social and behavioural programmes)
Values.69: Sec. voc. education level 1 general orientation programme
Values.74: Sec. voc. education levels 3/4 (health and welfare)
Values.75: Sec. voc. education levels 3/4 (humanities/arts/social and behavioural programmes)
Values.91: Sec. voc. education apprenticeship system levels 1/2 (agricultural)
Values.92: Sec. voc. education apprenticeship system levels 1/2 (technical)
Values.93: Sec. voc. education apprenticeship system levels 1/2 (economics)
Values.94: Sec. voc. education apprenticeship system levels 1/2 (health and welfare)
Values.101: Sec. voc. education apprenticeship system levels 3/4 (agricultural)
Values.102: Sec. voc. education apprenticeship system levels 3/4 (technical)
Values.103: Sec. voc. education apprenticeship system levels 3/4 (economics)
Values.104: Sec. voc. education apprenticeship system levels 3/4 (health and welfare)     105 Sec. voc. education apprenticeship system levels 3/4 (humanities/arts/social and behavioural programmes)
Values.116: Higher voc. education (social and behavioural programmes)
Values.126: Academic higher education (social and behavioural programmes)

edu2lev3.Name: Follow-up study programme: detailed level
edu2lev3.Remark: Variable is based on ROA education classification

Values.8: Secondary vocational education apprenticeship system levels 1
Values.9: Secondary vocational education apprenticeship system levels 2
Values.10: Secondary vocational education apprenticeship system levels 3
Values.11: Secondary vocational education apprenticeship system levels 4

edu2match.Name: Match between study programme and follow-up study programme

edu2qual.Name: Current situation with respect to follow-up study programme

edu2roa.Name: Follow-up study programme: code ROA education classification

edu2soi.Name: Follow-up study programme: national education classification code SOI

training.Name: Followed short course or in-house training

career.Name: Current job:  does job have good career opportunities?

empstat.Name: Employment status
empstat.Remark: People with paid work for more than 12 hours per week are 'employed'. People with no paid work or paid    work for less than 12 hours and who are looking for (other) paid work are considerd to be 'unemployed'. Respondents who consider themselves to be 'students' are excluded from this variable and have therefore no employment status.

jobfield.Name: Current job: required field of study vs qualification

jobhours.Name: Current job: number of regular working hours per week

jobinchour.Name: Current job: gross earnings per hour (euros)
jobinchour.Remark: values are indexed to 2012 price levels

jobincmth.Name: Current job: gross monthly earnings (euros)
jobincmth.Remark: values are indexed to 2012 price levels

jobisco1.Name: Current job: International Standard Classification of Occupations, major group (ISCO88)

jobisco2.Name: Current job: International Standard Classification of Occupations, sub-major group (ISCO88)

jobisco3.Name: Current job: International Standard Classification of Occupations, minor group (ISCO88)

jobisco4.Name: Current job: International Standard Classification of Occupations, unit group (ISCO88)

jobisic1.Name: Current job: International Standard Industrial Classification, section (ISIC rev. 4)

jobisic2.Name: Current job: International Standard Industrial Classification, division (ISIC rev. 4)

joblevel.Name: Current job: required level of education vs qualification

joborgsz.Name: Current job: size of the company (incl. other branches)

jobsatis.Name: Current job: satisfaction with current work

jobtemp.Name: Current job: fixed term or temporary contract

labforce.Name: Labour force status
labforce.Remark: The labour force consists of people with paid work for more than 12 hours per week and people who are    looking for paid work. Respondents who consider themselves to be 'students' are labeled as 'not in labour force'.

skillshort.Name: Current job: to what extent are capacities lacking?

skilluse.Name: Current job: to what extent are capacities utilized?

migrant.Name: Immigrant status respondent
migrant.Remark: Based on the CBS definition of 'Westerse allochtoon'.

eduabrd.Name: Study programme: follow part of study programma abroad

eduagain.Name: Study programme: would respondent choose same study programme again?
